1 Introduction This second CASA0005 GI Systems and Science seminar. It aims advanced your to data visualization skill in R using the ggplot2 package. By the end of the seminar you will be able to: - Advanced your knowledge about ggplot2 in R - Know ten advanced customization in ggplot - Create a high resolution graph for your research - Trouble-soluting by yourself

Recommend resources - Data Visualization with ggplot2 Cheat Sheet - RStudio - ggplot2: elegant graphics for data analysist - Data Visualization in R with ggplot2 - Top 50 ggplot2 Visualizations - The Master List (With Full R Code)
